A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a good movie.  The most conversational dialogue of all the Star Wars films\, with genuine reactions.  However\, I understand the frustrations expressed by other reviewers.  You can not build up questions and theories for two years and then leave so many unanswered or unfulfilled.  Additionally\, there were parts that could have been completely omitted (chunks of Vegas-like planet).   I think the broader messages of the film\, along with it's originality in telling the story\, are great...that's what brought up to 4 stars for me.  You can't squawk about the supposed rehashing of Force Awakens and then complain about this movie's format.  The old constructs of what Star Wars is needed to come down in order for it to survive going forward.  Watch it again with an open mind and I think you'll see what I'm talking about.  Thanks for reading and enjoy the ride!
